about_the_game:
Hello everyone! We are Fontainebieau, a fledgling game development team.
"MeetInParis"is the first game we have produced.

In this game, players will return to Paris in 1920 and play as a young man named Lian Feng who has traveled from afar to study in France. In this city of blooming flowers, they will experience the ups and downs of life and feel the warmth and coldness of human emotions.
After his old illusions are shattered, he will rediscover himself and the world, and face the future together with the one he loves.

"MeetInParis"is a pure love story without any additions from beginning to end! The game script is about 200,000 words, including more than 20 CG images and more than 10 exquisite character illustrations.

The main characters in this game are already over 18 years old when the story takes place.

Paris
The capital of the French Republic and the cultural center of Europe. It is known as the "City of Flowers" because of the abundance of flowers throughout the city. The magnificent Ottoman-style buildings are bathed in sunlight and neatly arranged on either side of wide streets, complemented by exquisite sculptures and towering churches. However, in the shadows of the buildings, unknown stories are quietly unfolding in the intricate and dirty alleys...


Association chinoise d'outre-mer
It is a grassroots mutual aid organization for Chinese people living in France. The association includes the Chinese-French Education Association, the Student Affairs Department, the Chinese Workers' Association in France, the Frugal Study Association, the Work-Study Association, and the editorial departments of various publications such as "Overseas Chinese Weekly". Its address is located in the northwest of Paris, donated by politician Zhang Jingjiang, and is a two-story building in the Art Nouveau style. Besides official functions, it is often used as a gathering place for Chinese people living in France.


Lycée Louis
It is a famous school in Paris located in the heart of the Latin Quarter. The school is surrounded by many famous buildings such as the French Academy, the Sorbonne University, and the Pantheon. Established by the Jesuits, it is known for its excellent teaching quality and outstanding students. In the preparatory class, a high percentage of students are admitted to prestigious universities such as ParisTech, École Normale Supérieure de Paris, and HEC Paris.


Appartement
The apartment that was prepared by Lian Zhi for Lian Feng is located in the historic buildings of the Latin Quarter. It is a small one-bedroom apartment, and although the exterior of the building is very old, the interior has recently been renovated and equipped with modern electrical equipment and a water heater. Sitting by the window, enjoying modern conveniences while admiring the scenery of the ancient streets, must be quite charming.


Le Train Bleu
A tea room located on the second floor of the Gare de Lyon train station in Paris. The restaurant was built in 1901 by the Paris City Council to welcome the World Exposition. Its name comes from the luxurious Blue Train that runs from the station to the Côte d'Azur. The interior of the restaurant is decorated in a magnificent style, with large scenic murals set in intricate reliefs, reminiscent of a royal palace.

highlighted.name: 50 centimes of fresh ground coffee is enough...
The Sun in the Night Sky

name: 花都之恋

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz 或 AMD A10
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 2048 MB available space
  • Sound Card: null

short_description: Paris in 1920, countless contradictions of nationality, class, ideology, and system supported the surface of peace. Under the shadow of bustling streets, caught between love and responsibility, what kind of choice will the Chinese student, Lian Feng, make?
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
